name: Steamer Mushroom Risotto
description: Bring the bistro home! Make a quick and easy version of a restaurant classic.

ingredients.name: Vegetable Broth
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 1 pkg (900 ml/30 oz) low-sodium vegetable broth

preparation: Place dip mix, mushrooms, and butter in the Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave on high 4 min.
Meanwhile, warm broth in a small pot on the stove.
Add warm broth and rice to steamer and cook uncovered on high for 5 min. Remove from microwave; stir in peas. Microwave uncovered on high for additional 8 min.
Fold in sour cream. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Cooked arborio rice is typically served with a little bit of a "bite" to the grain. If you prefer soft grains of rice, cook rice an extra 2 min in the microwave.
